alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:44PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Portage, Geauga, northeastern Medina, Cuyahoga, northern Summit and east central Lorain Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cleveland Heights to near Grafton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Chardon, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, South Russell, Burton, Highland Hills, Mantua and Chesterland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
